org.daisy.pipeline.tts

Class TTSLog

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.daisy.pipeline.tts.TTSLog

  • public class TTSLog
extends Object
    A class to log structured messages in a big list. TTSLog is meant to be allocated for every new Pipeline job and written to an external file after the TTS work of the job is done.

      Set<Map.Entry<String,TTSLog.Entry>> getEntries() 
      TTSLog.Entry getOrCreateEntry(String sentenceId)
      Supposed to be called within a single-threaded context
      TTSLog.Entry getWritableEntry(String sentenceId)
